mainScreen.title: Accept Bitcoin Payments
mainScreen.text: Send, Store, Exchange and Accept Cryptocurrency.

sectionHowItWorks.text: Brief description of how the app works

stepOne.subtitle: Send invoice
stepOne.text: Merchant issues an invoice in their local currency.

stepTwo.subtitle: Payment
stepTwo.text: The user pays in the currency in which it is convenient for him. We take care of all the difficulties with overpayments and underpayments.

stepThree.subtitle: Broadcast
stepThree.text: Conversion and withdrawal, the merchant at any time withdraws his funds to his wallet in the currency in which he is comfortable.

advantage1.subtitle: EU Regulated
advantage1.text: We support KYC compliance for operation in regulated regions.

advantage2.subtitle: All types of crypto
advantage2.text: Bitcoin, altcoins and stable coins are supported.

advantage3.subtitle: Major Blockchains
advantage3.text: Bitcoin, Lightning Network, Liquid Network, Ethereum, Polygon,  BSC and more.

advantage4.subtitle: Free of Charge
advantage4.text: All outgoing transactions, transfers and payouts in crypto are free of charge.

slideOne.subtitle: Merchants Solution
slideOne.textContent: The solution for businesses to accept crypto payments in any coins and automatically exchange it all into desired stable or currency.

slideTwo.subtitle: Enterprise Blockchain Wallets
slideTwo.textContent: We deploy infrastructure to provide coins self-custody for enterprise needs.

slideThree.subtitle: Wallet App
slideThree.textContent: Download Android or iOS application to instantly get access to your account.

slideFour.subtitle: API
slideFour.textContent: Automate acceptance in your web store, CRM or application with our feature full API.

mobileWallet.title: Mobile Wallet
mobileWallet.text: A solution enabling businesses to accept crypto payments in all major coins and exchange it all into Fiat, Coins or StableCoins.

availableCurrencies.title: Available Currencies
availableCurrencies.text: A vast range of major coins, stablecoins and liquid tokens is available.
availableCurrencies.subtitle: Coins

slideOne.title: FOREX & CFD Brokers
slideOne.text: Attract new clients by offering them a way to top up their accounts with many different cryptocurrencies.

slideTwo.title: E-commerce
slideTwo.text: The world of e-commerce has experienced massive growth. Reap the benefits of the huge online market by accepting crypto payments.

slideThree.title: Marketplaces
slideThree.text: There are many platforms used by businesses to sell their products or services. Offering crypto payments to customers is now the advantage.

slideFour.title: Travel Industry
slideFour.text: The travel industry is a growing sector. With increasing bookings now made online, it makes financial sense to accept crypto payments.

slideFive.title: Gambling
slideFive.text: The global online gambling industry is worth billions of dollars. Crypto payments are part for the course.

text.span: and going down based on your total transaction volume.

questions.title: Have a question?
questions.text: Explore our solutions or you can contact us through ticket system and contact form. Feel free to get in touch.

existing.title: For existing clients
existing.text: If you already have an account please use our ticket system.

new.title: For new clients or partners
new.text: Please leave your inquiry and our Business Development Team will contact you shortly.

footer.text: Our vision is to provide convenience and help increase your sales business.

content.questionOne: Can more than one person log in to the Thoth Merchant Panel?
content.answerOne: Within the same Merchant Panel, you can generate multiple API keys. These keys allow multiple individuals to access the API. You also have the option to share the wallet seed which grants multiple users access to the same Merchant Panel. However, we strongly advise against this because anyone with the seed phrase can gain access to the Merchant Panel.
content.answerTwo:
The cryptocurrencies we support for receiving are:

- BTC (onchain, Lightning Network, Liquid Network)
- ETH
- USDT (Erc20, Trc20, Bep20, Plg20, Liquid Network)
- BUSD (Bep20)
- Tron
- Matic
- BNB
- Stellar XLM
- EURMTL (euro stablecoin in Montenegro)

For fiat currencies used for pricing, refer to the table in the merchant manual.
content.questionThree: How do I get started with the API?
content.answerThree: Visit https://thothpay.com/merchant, scan the QR code with Blixt Wallet, and then use your profile on the dashboard to obtain your API token and the URL for the API documentation.
content.questionFour: What is the URL to connect to the API?
content.answerFour: Details for the API can be found here: https://thothpay.com/swagger/index.html
content.questionFive: Does Thothpay offer a withdrawal page? Or can withdrawals only be done from our wallet?
content.answerFive: Thothpay allows merchants to initiate withdrawals either through the Web UI at thothpay.com/merchant or via the API. Merchants should initiate withdrawals on behalf of their clients.
content.questionSix: Can users withdraw from their trading account to their wallet?
content.answerSix: Users can withdraw in any cryptocurrency through API calls from the CRM to Thothpay. However, the CRM must manage individual user balances. Thothpay only manages the aggregate balance of the entire merchant account.
content.questionSeven: How do we get started with deposits using the API key on Swagger?
content.answerSeven: Use the API key in the header to authenticate endpoints in Swagger. The 'k1' is used for authentication in the merchant panel, not for the API. After obtaining the API key from your profile page, you can authenticate it with any API endpoint.
content.questionEight: Which API endpoints should we use for deposits in Swagger?
content.answerEight: For deposits, refer to the POST /api/invoice endpoint. When pricing in dollars, use "currency" : { "Fiat": "Usd"}. Remember, 1 USD is represented as 100 in the amount field, as the API always uses the smallest unit of the currency.
content.questionNine: What is the base URL for the API?
content.answerNine: The base URL is https://thothpay.com/api/invoice. In Swagger, you can view a curl example by selecting "Try it out" followed by "Execute".
content.questionTen: Should the callback URL use the POST or GET method?
content.questionEleven: After creating the key, what's the next step?
content.answerEleven: The key should be used in the request's HTTP headers for the API. Instructions and examples can be found in the interactive documentation (Swagger) at https://thothpay.com/swagger
content.questionTwelve: What should I do if I encounter an error while testing the API?
content.answerTwelve: Capture a screenshot and provide the error details to the support team.

pageDeleteAccount.title: How to delete an account
pageDeleteAccount.description: The steps below outline the process for irreversibly deleting your account from the Thothpay service. Ensure you have withdrawn all funds before proceeding.

steps.stepOne: Have your Lightning wallet ready, the one you used to sign in to the system.
steps.stepTwo: Visit [this page](thothpay.com/merchant/delete) and log in as usual.
steps.stepThree: Input the confirmation statement in the designated field and click on "Yes, delete me."
steps.stepFour: If all goes well, you'll be redirected to the main page.

pageNotFound.subtitle: Page Not Found
